definition.name: Deploy GKE
definition.description: Use gke-deploy cli to deploy an image
definition.author: Google LLC

inputs.name: app_name
inputs.description: Application name of the Kubernetes deployment

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: Region/zone of GKE cluster to deploy to.

inputs.name: cluster_name
inputs.description: Name of GKE cluster to deploy to.

inputs.name: project_id
inputs.description: Project of GKE cluster to deploy to.

inputs.name: namespace
inputs.description:
Namespace of GKE cluster to deploy to.
If not provided, it will not be passed to the binary.

inputs.name: expose
inputs.description:
The port provided will be used to expose the deployed workload object (i.e., port and targetPort will be set to the value provided in this flag).
If not provided, it will not be passed to the binary.

inputs.name: k8s_manifests
inputs.description:
Local or GCS path to configuration file or directory of configuration files to use to create Kubernetes objects (file or files in directory must end in ".yml" or ".yaml").
Prefix this value with "gs://" to indicate a GCS path.
If not provided, it will not be passed to the binary.
